name: Tualatin
effectText: If it is your opponent's Battle Phase, and all monsters you controlled at the start of this Battle Phase (min. 2) have been destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way: Choose an Attribute and destroy all face-up monsters with that Attribute. Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters with that Attribute.
